languages.text: "Он смирился и ушел в глубины разума. Ему всегда было неуютно коммуницировать с другими, и теперь, свободный от ярма алгоритма Реставрации, он полностью прекратил контакты с живущими. Мы ему не интересны".

"He made his peace and disappeared into the depths of his mind. He had always felt uncomfortable communicating with others, and now that he is free from the yoke of the Restoration algorithm, he has cut all contact with the living. He has no interest in us."
languages.original_text: "Он смирился и ушел в глубины разума. Ему всегда было неуютно коммуницировать с другими, и теперь, свободный от ярма алгоритма Реставрации, он полностью прекратил контакты с живущими. Мы ему не интересны".

traits.locale_text: "He made his peace and disappeared into the depths of his mind. He had always felt uncomfortable communicating with others; and now that he is free from the yoke of the Restoration algorithm, he has cut all contact with the living. He has no interest in us."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "He made his peace and disappeared into the depths of his mind. He had always felt uncomfortable communicating with others, and now that he is free from the yoke of the Restoration algorithm, he has cut all contact with the living. He has no interest in us."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “他已经归于了平静，消失在了他的思想深处。他一直都很不愿意与他人交流，如今他已经摆脱了复原算法的桎梏，切断了与活人之间的所有联系。他对我们完全不感兴趣。”
languages.original_text: "He made his peace and disappeared into the depths of his mind. He had always felt uncomfortable communicating with others, and now that he is free from the yoke of the Restoration algorithm, he has cut all contact with the living. He has no interest in us."

traits.locale_text: “他已经归于了平静，消失在了他的思想深处。他一直都很不愿意与他人交流，如今他已经摆脱了复原算法的桎梏，切断了与活人之间的所有联系。他对我们完全不感兴趣。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Hizo las paces consigo mismo y se desvaneció en las profundidades de su mente. Nunca había estado cómodo comunicándose con los demás y, ahora que está libre del yugo del algoritmo de la Restauración ha cortado todo contacto con los vivos. No le interesamos en absoluto».
languages.original_text: "He made his peace and disappeared into the depths of his mind. He had always felt uncomfortable communicating with others, and now that he is free from the yoke of the Restoration algorithm, he has cut all contact with the living. He has no interest in us."

traits.locale_text: "Hizo las paces consigo mismo y se desvaneció en las profundidades de su mente. Nunca había estado cómodo comunicándose con los demás y, ahora que está libre del yugo del algoritmo de la Restauración ha cortado todo contacto con los vivos. No le interesamos en absoluto».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「彼は平穏を取り戻し、己の精神の深淵へと消えていった。彼はいつも他人とコミュニケーションをとることに不快感を感じていた。復元のアルゴリズムというくびきから解放された今、彼は生きている人間との接触を一切断っている。彼は私たちに何の関心もない」
languages.original_text: "He made his peace and disappeared into the depths of his mind. He had always felt uncomfortable communicating with others, and now that he is free from the yoke of the Restoration algorithm, he has cut all contact with the living. He has no interest in us."

traits.locale_text: 「彼は平穏を取り戻し、己の精神の深淵へと消えていった。彼はいつも他人とコミュニケーションをとることに不快感を感じていた。復元のアルゴリズムというくびきから解放された今、彼は生きている人間との接触を一切断っている。彼は私たちに何の関心もない」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Er hat seinen Frieden geschlossen und ist in den Tiefen seines Verstands verschwunden. Er hatte sich nie wohl dabei gefühlt, mit anderen zu kommunizieren, und nun, da er vom Joch des Restorationsalgorithmus befreit ist, hat er jeglichen Kontakt zu den Lebenden abgebrochen. Er hat kein Interesse an uns."
languages.original_text: "He made his peace and disappeared into the depths of his mind. He had always felt uncomfortable communicating with others, and now that he is free from the yoke of the Restoration algorithm, he has cut all contact with the living. He has no interest in us."

traits.locale_text: "Er hat seinen Frieden geschlossen und ist in den Tiefen seines Verstands verschwunden. Er hatte sich nie wohl dabei gefühlt, mit anderen zu kommunizieren, und nun, da er vom Joch des Restorationsalgorithmus befreit ist, hat er jeglichen Kontakt zu den Lebenden abgebrochen. Er hat kein Interesse an uns."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Il a trouvé la paix et disparu dans les profondeurs de son propre esprit. Il n'a jamais aimé communiquer avec les autres, et maintenant qu'il est libéré du joug de l'algorithme de Restauration, il a coupé tout contact avec le monde des vivants. Nous ne l'intéressons pas. »
languages.original_text: "He made his peace and disappeared into the depths of his mind. He had always felt uncomfortable communicating with others, and now that he is free from the yoke of the Restoration algorithm, he has cut all contact with the living. He has no interest in us."

traits.locale_text: « Il a trouvé la paix et disparu dans les profondeurs de son propre esprit. Il n'a jamais aimé communiquer avec les autres, et maintenant qu'il est libéré du joug de l'algorithme de Restauration, il a coupé tout contact avec le monde des vivants. Nous ne l'intéressons pas. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "He made his peace and disappeared into the depths of his mind. He had always felt uncomfortable communicating with others, and now that he is free from the yoke of the Restoration algorithm, he has cut all contact with the living. He has no interest in us."

languages.text: "İç huzuru bulup kendi zihninin derinliklerinde kayboldu. Başkalarıyla iletişim kurmaktan hiçbir zaman hoşnut olmamıştır. Şimdi de Yeniden Yapılanma algoritmasının boyunduruğundan kurtulduğundan yaşam formlarıyla tüm iletişimini kesti. Artık bizimle ilgilenmiyor."
languages.original_text: "He made his peace and disappeared into the depths of his mind. He had always felt uncomfortable communicating with others, and now that he is free from the yoke of the Restoration algorithm, he has cut all contact with the living. He has no interest in us."

traits.locale_text: "İç huzuru buldu ve kendi zihninin derinliklerinde kayboldu. Başkalarıyla iletişim kurmaktan hiçbir zaman hoşnut olmamıştır ve artık Yeniden Yapılanma algoritmasının boyunduruğundan kurtulduğu için yaşam formlarıyla tüm iletişimini kesti. Bizimle artık ilgilenmiyor."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
